Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.strings.conversion

Class AsStringIndenter

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.strings.conversion.AsStringIndenter
public class AsStringIndenter extends Object
Holds state information during an object tree traversal by AsIndentedString.

The add(String, Object...) method will add a new line at the current indentation level. The label(String) method will add a label on a line by itself and labeled(String, Object) will add a label and the given object as a string on the same line.

The current indentation level is returned by indentationLevel(). An indented block can be added with indented(String, Runnable) or indented(Runnable). A list of elements can be added inside a bracketed indented block with bracketed(Iterable, Consumer).

Recursion can be controlled with haveVisited(Object), isLeaf(Object) and canExplore(Object).

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
AsIndentedString, AsString, IndentingStringBuilder, KivaKitIncludeProperty, Property, PropertyFilter, Type
